title: Sri Lanka inks investment deals worth US$765mn in 1Q: BOI
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has inked 765mn dollars worth investment agreements in the first quarter of 2022, and had received applications for projects with 1,412 million US dollars, the Board of Investment said.
There were 22 investment proposals were from solar and wind, heavy industry, logistic and IT infrastructure sectors.
The BOI has set up an investment facilitation centre to expedite approvals. (Colobo/Apr06/2022)
